login.title: Login
login.account_does_not_exist: That account does not exist. Did you type the email wrong?
login.invalid_request: Email address is invalid, or password is too short.
login.wrong_method: This account might not have been registered this way. Try other login options.
login.internal_error: This error is not your fault! The server misbehaved.
login.internet_error: Your Internet connection might have gone out.

register.title: Register
register.name: Name
register.accept_privacy_required: You must accept the privacy policy to register.
register.invalid_request: Email address is invalid, or password is too short.
register.conflict: That email address is already registered.
register.internal_error: This error is not your fault! The server misbehaved.
register.internet_error: Your Internet connection might have gone out.

verify.already_verified_description: You have already verified your account! You don't need to do anything.
verify.email_sent: An email has been sent with your OTP code

forgot.title: Reset password
forgot.sent: If an account exists, we've sent an email with reset instructions.
forgot.invalid_request: Please enter a valid email address.
forgot.internal_error: This error is not your fault! The server misbehaved.
forgot.internet_error: Your Internet connection might have gone out.

categories.title: Manage Categories
categories.delete_description: Are you sure you want to delete the following category "{name}" (ID {id})?
categories.error_invalid_name: Category name is too long or too short.

auctions.title: My Auctions
auctions.error_posting: There was an error trying to create the auction.
auctions.error_description: Product description is invalid or not enough characters (50)
auctions.error_product_images: Product images are invalid or not enough images (3)
auctions.error_step_bid_type: Step bid type is invalid, must be percentage or fixed
auctions.error_expired_at: Expiry time is invalid, must be in the future

subscriptions.title: My Subscriptions
subscriptions.no_subscriptions: You don't have any susbcriptions active for seller privileges.
subscriptions.expires_in: You have permissions to upload auctions! This will expire in {in}.

acknowledgements.title: Acknowledgements
acknowledgements.fonts_paragraph: Fonts used here are based on Chiron GoRound TC, which is a SIL Open Font-licensed font, distributed by Google Fonts. The fonts are property of their respective owners, and we do not claim any ownership over them.

products.no_bids: No bids yet. Be the first!
products.cant_bid: You can't bid on this product
products.confirm_bid_description: Are you sure you want to bid on "{name}" at the price of {price}? This action is irrevocable.
products.cant_bid_logged_out: You must be logged in to bid
products.cant_bid_self: You can't bid on your own product
products.cant_bid_no_rating: You must have a rating score of 0.8
products.cant_bid_denied: You are denied from bidding on this product
products.cant_deny: Failed to deny bid. The auction might have already ended.
products.failed_to_bid: Failed to bid. Someone might have beaten you to it.
products.failed_to_create_chat: Couldn't create chat session. Are you the winner or the seller?
products.highest_bid: You hold the highest bid for this auction
products.outbidded: You got outbidded on this auction
products.expired: This product has expired, and you can no longer bid on it

profile.name: Full Name
profile.error_oauth: You don't use passwords to login
profile.no_ratings: No one has rated you yet

403.title: 403 Forbidden
403.description: You are logged in, but you are not authorized to view this page.

404.title: 404 Not Found
404.description: The page you requested does not exist.

500.title: 500 Internal Server Error
500.description: The server has an issue that I couldn't do anything for you.
